summary: Frontend-only testing of mobile optimization components integration. Verified TouchableScale, OptimizedImage, EnhancedRefreshControl, and OfflineBanner components are properly implemented and integrated. Homepage loads correctly, listing cards display with OptimizedImage placeholders for missing images, navigation to listing details works, and favorite buttons are functional.
critical_code_review_comments: TouchableScale properly implements scale animation (0.97) with spring physics and haptic feedback for iOS/Android
OptimizedImage correctly implements lazy loading with loading states, error fallback to ImagePlaceholder, and web-specific loading='lazy' optimization
EnhancedRefreshControl integrates haptic feedback on refresh trigger
OfflineBanner uses animated banner with pulse effect and retry button
All specialized listing cards (ListingCard, PropertyListingCard, AutoListingCard, HorizontalListingCard) properly use TouchableScale and OptimizedImage
BrandGrid and RecommendationSection properly use TouchableScale for brand tiles and See All button

Note: The main homepage (tabs/index.tsx) uses an inline ListingCard that does NOT use the mobile optimization components - this appears intentional as a lighter-weight implementation for the main feed
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile optimization components are properly integrated. TouchableScale provides scale animation with haptics, OptimizedImage handles lazy loading with placeholders, EnhancedRefreshControl adds haptic feedback to pull-to-refresh, OfflineBanner shows network status. Components are used in specialized listing cards (/src/components/listings/) and auto section components (/src/components/auto/). The main homepage feed uses a simpler inline ListingCard without these optimizations.
